title: Cpp 0.9.1-60 won't sync with Go 0.9.4-60
body:
I want to set up a fresh cpp node for [eth-netstats](https://eth-netstats.herokuapp.com/) and when I try to sync I'm getting the following weird behaviours:
## Case 1: sync with bootstrap node

If I try syncing it with the bootstrap node 52.16.188.185:

```
eth -x 1 -r 52.16.188.185 -p 30303 -m off -n off -v 8 -i -j
```

I'm getting:

```
-N- [ 16:25:04 | p2p |  0 ] Transition! State from Nothing , holding
*N* [ 16:25:04 | p2p ] p2p.host.peer.register 09fbeec0…
-N- [ 16:25:04 | p2p |  0 ] Status: 2
-N- [ 16:25:04 | p2p |  0 ] Status: 60 / 0 / fd4af92a… , TD: 14853656933 = 2bcc99d4…
-N- [ 16:25:04 | p2p |  0 ] Transition! Nothing from State , holding & needed
-N- [ 16:25:04 | p2p |  0 ] Transition! Hashes from Nothing , holding & needed
*** [ 16:25:05 | p2p ] 0x7fed20e02360 : inject: 1428290410 1000000 [403a091a] 
*** [ 16:25:05 | p2p ] 0x7fed20e02360 : inject: 1428290605 1000000 [403a091a] 
*** [ 16:25:05 | p2p ] 0x7fed20e02360 : inject: 1428290825 1000000 [3672fd03] 
*** [ 16:25:05 | p2p ] 0x7fed20e02360 : inject: 1428290413 1000000 [3672fd03] 
!!! [ 16:25:36 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
(o) [ 16:25:36 | <unknown> ] +++ 0 00000000…
(o) [ 16:25:36 | <unknown> ] +++ 1 00000000…
!!! [ 16:25:41 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
!!! [ 16:25:47 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
!!! [ 16:25:53 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
!!! [ 16:25:59 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
!!! [ 16:26:04 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
!!! [ 16:26:10 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
!!! [ 16:26:16 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
!!! [ 16:26:22 | <unknown> ] Couldn't find requested block: 00000000…
!P! [ 16:26:57 | p2p ] Invalid Message hash from 52.16.188.185 : 30303
```

It won't sync anything. It will hang at block `#0` forever.
## Case 2: sync with aws geth nodes

If I try syncing it with a geth node from my aws instances (having current block `#21556`, IP: `54.174.254.175`):

```
eth -x 1 -r 54.174.254.175 -p 30303 -m off -n off -v 8 -i -j
```

I'm getting:

```
=B= [ 14:09:10 | eth ] cc754c1be60ac674b8b544804b8b687aeb86f6320038e5802bb7fc69ede8ac67 : Unknown parent beb1747f973915aeee5bb6888799f26609ca6c73ba9ea8166ad7fe24d06a28c9
!!! [ 14:09:10 | eth ] Unknown parent of block!!! cc754c1b… /build/buildd/cpp-ethereum-0.9.1+609SNAPSHOT20150402192853trusty/libethereum/BlockChain.cpp(296): Throw in function dev::h256s dev::eth::BlockChain::import(const bytes&, const dev::OverlayDB&)
Dynamic exception type: boost::exception_detail::clone_impl<dev::eth::UnknownParent>
std::exception::what: std::exception

[]Q [ 14:09:10 | eth ] Queuing block cc754c1b… for import...
[]Q [ 14:09:10 | eth ] Already known.
=B= [ 14:09:10 | eth ] accb408f9f37d29c940501c50e830d13158d16d2aa09098e044b04eb45073e67 : Unknown parent cc754c1be60ac674b8b544804b8b687aeb86f6320038e5802bb7fc69ede8ac67
!!! [ 14:09:10 | eth ] Unknown parent of block!!! accb408f… /build/buildd/cpp-ethereum-0.9.1+609SNAPSHOT20150402192853trusty/libethereum/BlockChain.cpp(296): Throw in function dev::h256s dev::eth::BlockChain::import(const bytes&, const dev::OverlayDB&)
Dynamic exception type: boost::exception_detail::clone_impl<dev::eth::UnknownParent>
std::exception::what: std::exception

[]Q [ 14:09:10 | eth ] Queuing block accb408f… for import...
[]Q [ 14:09:10 | eth ] Already known.
!P! [ 14:10:20 | p2p ] Invalid Message hash from 54.174.254.175 : 30303
```

And it will sync only until block `#13476` and remain there forever. This is also the case if I try syncing it with more than one Go node from my aws instances.
## Case 3: sync with cpp nodes

If I try syncing it with any cpp node:

```
eth -x 1 -r poc-9.ethdev.com -p 30303 -m off -n off -v 8 -i -j
```

It will sync correctly all the way.
